选择推理模式（批次推理：更适合长句，性能翻倍）: Select inference mode (Batch inference: more suitable for long sentences, doubles performance)
**GPT2 采样设置** _参数会影响音频多样性和生成速度详见[Generat: **GPT2 Sampling Settings** _Parameters affect audio diversity and generation speed. See [Generation strategies](https://huggingface.co/docs/transformers/main/en/generation_strategies)_
生成Token最大数量，过小导致音频被截断: Maximum number of generated tokens, too small will cause audio truncation
**分句设置** _参数会影响音频质量和生成速度_: **Sentence Segmentation Settings** _Parameters affect audio quality and generation speed_
建议80~200之间，值越大，分句越长；值越小，分句越碎；过小过大都可能导致音频: Recommended 80~200, larger values create longer sentences; smaller values create shorter segments; too small or too large may reduce audio quality
分句分桶的最大容量（批次推理生效）: Maximum capacity for sentence batching (effective in batch inference)
建议2-8之间，值越大，一批次推理包含的分句数越多，过大可能导致内存溢出: Recommended 2-8, larger values include more sentences per batch, too large may cause memory overflow
